Name: Port or Terminal Function Code
Notes: Code defining function performed at the port or terminal with respect to a shipment

Name: Location Qualifier
Remarks: P0203: If either R4-02 or R4-03 is present, then the other is required

Name: Location Identifier
Notes: Code which identifies a specific location

Name: Port Name
Notes: Free-form name for the place at which an offshore carrier originates or terminates (by transshipment or otherwise) its actual ocean carriage of property

Name: State or Province Code
Notes: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency
